pages.name: Zombies
pages.text: Zombies are one of, if not the most common monster of the Overworld. The origins

of zombies is speculatory, but it’s known that zombies are the result of a horrible disease. The disease takes control of a dead victim’s body, causing them to reanimate. The infected individual then hunts others, spreading the disease. Thankfully, most modern adventurers have a latent immunity to the disease.
